data.title: Luxury 5 Star Hotels & Resorts Worldwide
data.meta_description: Our luxury award-winning hotels and resorts worldwide. Mandarin Oriental hotels offer world-class accommodations, spas and fine dining experiences.
data.text:
Dubai

Royal Saffron

Indulge in an extravagant ritual reserved for royalty. Potent and luxurious blends of exotic 24k gold, saffron and mogra, the Queen of Jasmines sourced directly from artisan growers and distillers producing the finest quality of aromatics blended by hand to produce an incredibly luxurious offering. These actives not only assist with cellular regeneration, pigmentation and rejuvenation, but also work towards empowering the spirit, hormonal balance and emotional equilibrium.

To book, please email modub-spa@mohg.com or call +971 4 777 2222

AED 2,250

London

Functional Movement Treatment

The functional movement treatment is a hybrid treatment experience focusing on mobility, flexibility and stability and can be used to optimise preparation, performance, and recovery as a principal goal. This dynamic treatment experience involves your therapist performing assisted movement techniques alongside movement health technologies to enhance form and function. The perfect treatment to support a full and active life. The Functional Movement Treatment is performed in the Movementum Studio and may include the use of the Hypervolt and Normatech equipment.

For bookings, please call +44 (0) 207 201 3808 or email molon-spa@mohg.com.

GBP 90

GBP 180

Shanghai

Chinese Meridian Massage

Focusing on acupressure points and directional flow of the Qi in the body. Chinese Meridian Massage is more than a system of relaxation and tension release. The attention is on the subtle energy channels which influence the Qi in the organs on a deeper level, helping to treat many conditions.

*Prices are subject to 15% service charge
